name: Covert Investigation and Whistleblowing
description: Developing intelligence-gathering strategies and secure reporting methods to expose trafficking networks.
focus: Legal and Digital Protection for Whistleblowers

cards.title: Surveillance and Intelligence Gathering
cards.description: Covert techniques for gathering evidence on trafficking networks without detection.
bulletpoints: Using open-source intelligence (OSINT) to track trafficking activity.
Understanding undercover methods to collect firsthand data.
Risk assessment and operational security in field investigations.
cards.summaryText: Blend OSINT sweeps with undercover intel while hardening op-sec in the field.

cards.title: Whistleblowing and Safe Exposure
cards.description: How to report human trafficking networks while ensuring anonymity and security.
bulletpoints: Choosing the right organizations and legal entities for whistleblowing.
Utilizing encryption and anonymity tools for digital reporting.
Legal protections and risks associated with exposing trafficking networks.
cards.summaryText: Select vetted reporting channels, encrypt everything, and weigh legal shields versus exposure risk.

cards.title: Disrupting High-Level Trafficking Networks
cards.description: Strategic methods for dismantling elite-connected trafficking rings.
bulletpoints: Understanding connections between human trafficking and organized crime.
Following the financial trail to expose high-level traffickers.
Coordinating with anti-trafficking task forces and independent operatives.
cards.summaryText: Map organized crime ties, chase money trails, and sync strikes with allied task forces.
